original_title: Operations in upcountry Railway line suspended for 06 months
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Department of Railways says that the railway operations from Mahawa to Anuradhapura along the upcountry Railway line will be suspended for six months from the 7th of January 2024.
The Department of Railways says that trains will operate from Colombo Fort to Mahawa and from Kankesanthurai to Anuradhapura.
Applications to be called for the second phase of the Aswesuma relief in January
